content: The Centipede Guai is a required Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the middle section of The Webbed Hollow, this imposing insect guards the Bonevault leading down to the lower parts of the hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Guai'.
The content is as follows:
The Centipede Guai is a required Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the middle section of The Webbed Hollow, this imposing insect guards the Bonevault leading down to the lower parts of the hollow.
